titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that President Obama should take immediate action to mitigate the humanitarian crisis along the international border between the United States and Mexico involving unaccompanied migrant children and to prevent future crises.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
6/26/2014--Introduced. Designates July 2014 as Summer Meals Awareness Month.
Encourages members of Congress, schools, local businesses, nonprofit institutions, churches, cities, and state governments to: (1) assist in the efficient use of summer food service program sites by raising awareness of their locations; and (2) support efforts to increase the participation of eligible children who, without such program, may go without meals.
Encourages members of Congress to visit a summer food service program site to see the program's importance firsthand.
